metadata.title: CVE-2017-6820 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: rcube_utils.php in Roundcube before 1.1.8 and 1.2.x before 1.2.4 issusceptible to a cross-site scripting vulnerability via a crafted CascadingStyle Sheets (CSS) token sequence within an SVG element.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
